projects-page-intro: List of projects created either as school or free-time projects.
home-page-intro: Hello, I am web developer enthusiast looking for my first job opportunity.
about-me-detail: After 7 years working in the hospitality industry I have decided to change my career and jump into programming world. It started with simple Hello World programs.
dynamic-content-detail: Application content can be dynamically created, updated and deleted from the admin section.
e-commerce-description: Web application simulating single page e-commerce website with dynamic content manageable from the protected admin section.

phone-cases-shop.title: E-commerce website
phone-cases-shop.description: Full e-commerce solution for phone accessories with its own content management system and integrated payment gateways.
phone-cases-shop.description-detail: This e-commerce website was created as a project for my portfolio and to enhance my skills with Javascript and PHP frameworks (Vuejs and Laravel) in realistic project. It implements basic features of both - modern website and e-commerce solution.

manageable-content-items.carousel: Products displayed in products carousel on the home page
manageable-content-items.products-features: Products categories, brands, models, colors and materials
manageable-content-items.other-pages: Content of Return & Refund policies, Trading terms and GRPR pages

phone-cases-shop.admin-section-detail: Content can be managed from the admin section. Admin routes are protected both on client (VueJS Navigation Guards) and server side (Laravel Gates).
phone-cases-shop.email-notification-detail: Customer is notified by email about successful checkout and after his order is confirmed.
phone-cases-shop.responsiveness-detail: Responsiveness is achieved mostly by Bootstrap grid system. All others elements requiered action were modified by Sass mixins.
phone-cases-shop.shopping-cart-details: Products added to the basket are stored with no expiration date in the HTML5 web storage (localStorage) therefore they are available on the page refresh and even after the webpage is left and revisited. Items can be deleted from the basket within the basket page and from the shop menu.

phone-cases-shop-videos.categoryCRUD-detail: Categories, brands and models can be created, updated and deleted from the admin section. Categories are displayed in the sidebar menu after their creation.
phone-cases-shop-videos.creating-model: Creating model and attaching it to its brand
phone-cases-shop-videos.creating-model-detail: Product model must be created before adding the product.
phone-cases-shop-videos.attaching-brand-and-model: Attaching brand and model to selected category
phone-cases-shop-videos.attaching-brand-and-model-detail: Brands and models need to be attached to the category before they are displayed in the shop sidebar menu.
phone-cases-shop-videos.adding-product-detail: Categories, brands and models need to be created and attached to each other before adding the product. While adding the product, the user needs to select its category, brand and model. Product model can be then accessed in the shop sidebar under selected category.
phone-cases-shop-videos.placing-order-stripe: Placing order with Stripe payment gateway
phone-cases-shop-videos.managing-policies: Managing dynamic GDPR, rules of return and trading rules pages
phone-cases-shop-videos.managing-policies-detail: Content of the return & refund policies, trading terms and GDPR pages are highly customizable with the WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) editor which is wrapping the text in HTML tags.

weather-app.title: Weather and News mobile application
weather-app.description: Mobile application created as final project of Mobile Applications Development module at GMIT.
weather-app.bookmarks-detail: User of the application can bookmark any arcitle. This arcitle is then stored persistently in the Ionic Storage. Bookmarks can be then revisited or deleted from the Bookmarks page.
weather-app.bookmarks-badge-detail: Rounded badge showing number of bookmarked articles in the Ionic storage
weather-app.ionic-searchbar-detail: User can find any location by using the Ionic Searchbar implemented in settings. List of all found cities is generated by OpenWeather Geocoding API which is already included in free plan of Current Weather Data API. Request is being sent as soon as the user makes pause while typing the city name.
weather-app.rotating-icon: Rotating icon and wind cardinal direction
weather-app.rotating-icon-detail: Icon is rotating on wind degree data coming from the OpenWeather API. Cardinal directions are also set by this deg value.

laptopmania.description: Website created as final project of Web Application Development module at GMIT.

sap-concur.description: Wordpress website created as school project hosted on an AWS cloud-based LAMP server.

blog-system.description: Blog website with its own content management system represented by protected admin and user areas.

java.title: Java projects
java.description: Java projects completed as GMIT's modules final projects.

education.high-school: Secondary grammar school arm. gen. L. Svobodu in Humenne
education.university: Academy of the Police Force in Bratislava
education.university-description: Bachelor of Legal Protection of Persons and Property
education.gmit-description: Higher Diploma in Computing - Software Development
